mapper.select: SELECT U_StockList1.Modle, U_StockList1.Brand, U_StockList1.Price, U_StockList1.Quantity, U_StockList1.Year, StockQuantity.Quantity AS StockQuantity, /*现有库存数量*/ LatestStockPrice.kc_price_final, /*最近一次库存定价*/ LatestQuotation.U_QuoPrice /*最近一次采购报价*/ FROM U_StockList1 LEFT JOIN ( /*最近一次定价信息*/ SELECT DISTINCT kc_now.Brand, kc_now.ItemName, kc_now.kc_price_final, kc_now.ConfirmDate FROM ( SELECT ItemName, Brand, MAX ( ConfirmDate ) AS ConfirmDate FROM kc_now WHERE Modify = 'Y' AND kc_price_final IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ItemName, Brand ) LastDate LEFT JOIN kc_now ON kc_now.ItemName = LastDate.ItemName AND LastDate.Brand = kc_now.Brand AND LastDate.ConfirmDate = kc_now.ConfirmDate ) LatestStockPrice ON LatestStockPrice.Brand = U_StockList1.Brand AND LatestStockPrice.ItemName = U_StockList1.Modle LEFT JOIN ( /*最近一次采购报价*/ SELECT T_ICIN1.Modle, T_ICIN1.Brand, T_ICIN1.U_QuoPrice, T_ICIN1.U_QuoDate FROM ( SELECT MAX(U_QuoDate) AS U_QuoDate, T_ICIN1.Modle, T_ICIN1.Brand FROM T_ICIN1 WHERE T_ICIN1.U_QuoDate IS NOT NULL AND T_ICIN1.U_QuoPrice IS NOT NULL GROUP BY T_ICIN1.Modle, T_ICIN1.Brand ) LastDate LEFT JOIN T_ICIN1 ON LastDate.Brand = T_ICIN1.Brand AND LastDate.Modle = T_ICIN1.Modle AND LastDate.U_QuoDate = T_ICIN1.U_QuoDate WHERE T_ICIN1.U_QuoDate IS NOT NULL AND T_ICIN1.U_QuoPrice IS NOT NULL ) LatestQuotation ON LatestQuotation.Brand = U_StockList1.Brand AND LatestQuotation.Modle = U_StockList1.Modle LEFT JOIN ( /*各型号品牌现有库存数量*/ SELECT T_OBTN.ItemName, StockBrand.Brand, SUM( CASE WHEN T.Quantity = 0 THEN 0 WHEN T.Quantity < T_OBTN.U_LockQty THEN T.Quantity ELSE T_OBTN.U_LockQty END ) AS Quantity FROM ( SELECT MdAbsEntry, SUM(Quantity) AS Quantity FROM T_OBTQ GROUP BY MdAbsEntry ) T INNER JOIN T_OBTN ON T.MdAbsEntry = T_OBTN.AbsEntry LEFT JOIN ( /*通过物料编码字段 匹配 T_OITM（物料主数据表）的品牌*/ SELECT T_OBTN.ItemName, IIF(ISNULL(T_OITM.U_QuoBrand, '') = '', T_OITM.U_Brand, T_OITM.U_QuoBrand) AS Brand FROM T_OBTN INNER JOIN T_OITM ON T_OBTN.ItemCode = T_OITM.ItemCode ) StockBrand ON StockBrand.ItemName = T_OBTN.ItemName GROUP BY T_OBTN.ItemName, StockBrand.Brand ) StockQuantity ON StockQuantity.ItemName = U_StockList1.Modle AND StockQuantity.Brand = U_StockList1.Brand LEFT JOIN ( SELECT U_StockRank.Modle, U_StockRank.Brand, U_StockRank.TotalScore FROM U_StockRank ) StockRank ON StockRank.Modle = U_StockList1.Modle AND StockRank.Brand = U_StockList1.Brand WHERE U_StockList1.DocEntry = #{sc.docEntry}
